data.title: Public lecture on European innovation by Siim Kallas, former Vice-President of the European Commission
data.meta_description: European College of University of Tartu invites you to a public lecture entitled “The European Dilemmas of Innovation and Modernization” by Mr Siim K
data.text:
European College of University of Tartu invites you to a public lecture entitled “The European Dilemmas of Innovation and Modernization” by Mr Siim Kallas, Visiting Professor of the University of Tartu and Special Adviser to Valdis Dombrovskis, European Commission Vice President for the Euro and Social Dialogue.

20 May 2015, 12.15–14.00 at Lossi 36, room 103

“We have plenty of competitive advantage that we have not yet exploited. My job is to point out the bottlenecks and make Estonia a better place. If we can be an example to ourselves, we can be the same for Europe that greatly needs good examples,“ says Siim Kallas.
